thread.title: A tattoo artist inked up his cat and people are outraged (10 photos)
thread.title_full: A tattoo artist inked up his cat and people are outraged (10 photos)

author: Alex
title: A tattoo artist inked up his cat and people are outraged (10 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
A Russian tattoo artist is getting some serious backlash for dosing his hairless Sphinx with anesthesia and inking four large tattoos on its body. 
The tattoo fanatic, known only ask Aleksandr, gave his cat Demon traditional Russian prison tats, including a prison tower, playing cards, and cigarettes. 2 
“Of course I feel pity for doing it to him. It’s not like he wanted to do it himself. He has a different skin, so tattoos are applied differently,” Aleksandr said. “I hope it is not too bad for him, it is not his first tattoo. Usually he feels fine and recovers from the anesthesia pretty fast.” 3 
Elizabeth Skorynin, the head of an animal rehabilitation center, says tattooing a hairless cat is dangerous as their skin is extremely sensitive. Even worse, she adds that putting a small animal under anesthesia can be deadly. 4 
But another local tattoo artist, Aleksandr Purtov, defended the practice. Purtov says it’s no different from farmers branding their livestock. 
The internet was pretty much unanimously pissed off: 5
